fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose a person to obfuscate.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn all notifications and feedback that your target would have received.
- The target will be falsely told that their ability failed and receive no other notifications that night.
- With the Necronomicon, you will deal a Basic attack to your target, and all previous obfuscations will be permanent.
